full_description:
Join us as we pursue our disruptive new vision to make machine data accessible, usable and valuable to everyone. We are a company filled with people who are passionate about our product and seek to deliver the best experience for our customers. At Splunk, we’re committed to our work, customers, having fun and most importantly to each other’s success. Learn more about Splunk careers and how you can become a part of our journey!
Role:
Splunk is the only purpose-built Security Automation & Orchestration platform, and the first to provide an open growing and community for sharing playbooks, apps and new technologies. It makes security smarter, faster, and stronger.
We are looking for an exceptionally motivated Operating System and Python Developer with a solid grasp and real passion for security to extend the capabilities of our premier platform. With a razor sharp focus on well tested, performant code, come help protect the world's networks.
Responsibilities:
Design and implement new features to reduce mean-time-to-resolution of security events
Ability to troubleshoot, diagnose, and develop the platform specifically at the operating system level - Installation, Upgrade, and Maintenance
Act as a liaison between development teams and support teams, developing support runbooks to make the support team more effective at their role while offloading repetitive support issues from engineering.
Effectively partner with software development, QA, and release teams solving hard problems and improvements
Clearly communicate complex ideas and improvements to co-workers and interested parties of all skill levels
Requirements:
Passionate about Python, scripting, automation, and development
Good understanding of operating system level shell scripting, RPM/package installation, dependency debugging, file system behavior and performance
Good understanding of functions, improvements, classes, comprehensions, exceptions and problem solving in Python is a huge plus
Understanding of the threading limitations of Python, multi-process architecture, fundamentals and analytical skills.
Take pride writing reusable, scalable, testable, and rapidly growing efficient code
Familiar with unit testing, Exceptional debugging skills
Deep understanding of code versioning tools (e.g. Git) is a huge plus
Proficient and growing understanding of REST APIs and requests module
Experience and real passion for Security and new technologies is a plus.
Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience.
We value diversity at our company. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, or any other applicable legally protected characteristics in the location in which the candidate is applying.
For job positions in San Francisco, CA, and other locations where required, we will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records.
